items.title: Inspect current prompt question model and UI rendering

narrative.Background: The prompt was currently a fully editable textarea and needed to become a fixed question with an editable blank.
narrative.Problem: Without identifying existing model/UI flow, persistence-compatible changes could break saved drafts.

items.title: Implement editable 80+ character blank field tied to persisted document data

narrative.Background: The blank in the question needed direct editing and autosave with the rest of the document.
narrative.Problem: The UI had to preserve a fixed sentence while keeping storage in promptQuestion compatible.

narrative.Background: Prompt handling and rendering updates can introduce type and behavior regressions.
narrative.Problem: Verification was required to ensure compilation and tests still pass.
